name: Form Validation Error
description: This category includes all failures related to form validation errors like missing or invalid fields.

name: Known Issue
description: These are issues known in the system and tracked separately.

name: Flaky Test
description: Tests that fail intermittently due to unstable conditions.

name: Product Bug
description: Failures caused by bugs in the product, like unhandled exceptions or errors during test execution.

name: Field Input Error
description: Validation failures caused by incorrect field inputs such as invalid name lengths.
